page.title: 18ACTIVITIES FOR ADULTS
page.content: {BRITISH LEGION All members tend to be ex-servicemen from the 1st or 2nd World Wars. They meet in the Black Horse (public house) Little Weighton on last Mon.each month {GARDENING CLUB} Held in village hall about 4 times a year. They have a plant sale in April and a flower/vegetable show in July. {PIGEON FANCIERS} 13 members meet at village pub every Saturday. The club is called "Little Weighton Flying Club" and races are held most weeks. {DARBY AND JOAN} To join, ladies must be 60yrs+ and men 65yrs+. About 18 members play Bingo or have a chat with friends every other Thursday in the village hall.
